welcome: Welcome to the Dungeon Master App!
home_body: You are logged in and can manage your campaigns.
home_hint: Start by exploring the navigation menu.
delete_account_desc: This action is irreversible. All your data will be deleted.
delete_account_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
delete_account_error: An error occurred while deleting the account.
